name: Sonic Free For All Battle
short_description:
The aim of this project is to provide the ultimate sonic mugen game and to archive all the work ever done for sonic mugen characters and stages so they will never be lost to time.

In addition to simpling archiving work done by others, this project also aims to finish all incomplete characters and stages, as well as re-balance and revamp existing ones.

This project uses the M.U.G.E.N 1.0.0 engine and is being used and distributed under the fair use act.

M.U.G.E.N is © Elecbyte .
All original game music is © SEGA.
All characters and stages are © There respective creators.

If you would like know more, open up stage or character .def file and look for the line "author =" to see who the creator was for that individual matieral.
summary: M.U.G.E.N Game Based Around The Sonic Series

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
